nodes.text: Troos was a planet located within the Gordian Reach of the Outer Rim Territories.
During the reign of Xim's empire, the planet was known as Vynx.

Troos was located on the edge of the Radama Void. It was a wild, forested world that was home to a dizzying variety of arthropods. The world was covered in subarctic forests and armored crebik and Bahl fly were native to this world.
